body_html:
Hmm, I don't believe this is supported -- essentially what you're doing is to "hint" at TensorFlow to do a backward shape inference (which does not exist yet), and try to force the runtime to settle on the inferred branch.

I might be wrong - so assigning to @yuanbyu to take a look.

body:
Hmm, I don't believe this is supported -- essentially what you're doing is to "hint" at TensorFlow to do a backward shape inference (which does not exist yet), and try to force the runtime to settle on the inferred branch.  

I might be wrong - so assigning to @yuanbyu to take a look.
